member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder.AddFontFaceReference
member.summary: Adds a reference to a font to the set being built. The necessary metadata will automatically be extracted from the font upon calling CreateFontSet.
member.param: Font face reference object to add to the set.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder.AddFontFaceReference
member.summary: Adds a reference to a font to the set being built. The necessary metadata will automatically be extracted from the font upon calling CreateFontSet.
member.param: Font face reference object to add to the set.
List of properties to associate with the reference.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder.AddFontSet
member.summary: Appends an existing font set to the one being built, allowing one to aggregate two sets or to essentially extend an existing one.
member.param: Font set to append font face references from.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder.CreateFontSet
member.summary: Creates a font set from all the font face references added so far with AddFontFaceReference.
member.param: Contains the newly created font set object, or nullptr in case of failure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSetBuilder
member.summary: Contains methods for building a font set.
